name: Adventure Field Trilogy
description:
Adventure Field™

The original Adventure Field™ from 2008 with grammar corrections and new scripts!

  • A new battle script as been integrated to the game ( Zoom in battle, 3D arrow, Icons )...
  • There 2 new quality of life option to the game : Fast Battle & Random Encounter Off...
  • You can now play with a controller just like AF3, customization are  in the options!
  • I ported some of AF3 scripts into it to improve the overall experience...
  • Major balance edit to the game and heal crystal in dungeons...
  • Sara stays with you for all of the game like in the 3D Remaster version...
  • Surely some other stuff i forgot to mention...
Adventure Field™ 2

The Adventure Field™ 2 from 2012 with grammar corrections and new scripts!

  • A new battle script as been integrated to the game ( Zoom in battle, 3D arrow, Icons )...
  • One new quality of life option to the game : Fast Battle...
  • You can now play with a controller just like AF3, customization are  in the options!
  • I ported some of AF3 scripts into it to improve the overall experience...
  • Major balance edit to the game and heal crystal in dungeons...
  • Surely some other stuff i forgot to mention...
Adventure Field™ 3 Definitive Edition

It is 2017, you are Atoa, a young student living in the country of Sarook. Day after day living the perfect young student life, you begin to feel something is not right. In a dream you see a sword, a sword with a powerful aura. The very next day, the said sword is sent to the future from the past for you to find it. You then get teleported to a kingdom long forgotten. Not so forgotten because it is the same place but 1100 b.c. You have to fight your way home with no real promises of success... This game is a  25 hours side view battle JRPG in the taste of all the classic rpg game from the beloved super Nintendo era...

This game took over 3 years to make and was made with some ripped assets and music from other popular game, mostly music. It is an old game that i refreshed and published on itch.io for you to enjoy for free, that is why the game is free (F2P) and will remain free forever. Hope you will enjoy the game for what it is and not for what assets it use!

English is not my first language and back then i decided to make the game in English even if i was not good so that more people would understand it and play it around the world... Please don't be mean, it is a free game... As of version 3.0.0.0 the game text as been changed a little to help the player understand the story and the lore a little more...

In this big update to the game some changes as been made like :

Common changes List

  • Text correction
  • New texts
  • Tweaked cut scenes
  • Quality of life changes
  • New maps
  • New items
  • A lot of bug fixed
  • Major game balance and enhancements

New items

  • Exit Rope
  • Stats Diary
  • Sarook Bestiary
  • Puzzle Bell
  • Pegasus Ring

New mechanics & Improvements

  • Incubator Stable ( Pet dropping items )
  • Sarook Bestiary ( Including the shiny version of the monsters )
  • Puzzle Bell ( Reset the room if you fail or get stuck in a puzzle )
  • Pegasus Ring ( Battles go a lot faster at the cost of 15% of your exp & golds )
  • Cutting woods now take way less times
  • More minor changes

To use controller connected by USB go to your Windows Game Controller Setting and choose advanced... Choose your controller as the preferred default controller in the drop down menu..

We really hope you will all enjoy this epic 3 chapter adventure!
